body.name: KOLEX Nonstick Deep Frying Pan Skillet, 11 Inch Saute Pan with Lid, Stay-cool Handle, Chef Pan Healthy Stone Cookware Cooking Pan, Induction Compatible, PFOA Free (White Granite, 11 Inch)
body.stockDetail: Only 6 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: ECO-FRIENDLY NON-STICK GRANITE: Non-stick Granite Material, SGS & EUROFIN approved, 100% free of PFOS,PFOA. Our pan ensures your daily cooking is always safer and healthier.
PATENTED OCTAGONAL MULTI POURING SPOUT: Inspired from European octagonal architecture. Octagonal diamond golden ration cut designed for mess-free pours and greater cooking control.

VERSATILE SAUTE PAN WITH EIGHT POUR SPOUTS - Size: 12.5" diameter, 3.6" deep, 6 Quart capacity. Deep and large enough for saute, stirfry, boil, shallow fry & deep fry. Eight pouring spout is super handy for soups and oils.

SUPERIOR NONSTICK & EFFORTLESS CLEANING: Our pan features a ultra nonstick coating that ensures effortless food release and easy cleanup. Enjoy cooking without the hassle of food sticking, saving you time and effort in the kitchen.

LONG-LASTING DURABILITY: Built to withstand daily use, our pan is made from high-quality materials that ensure long-lasting performance. Invest in a reliable and durable kitchen companion that will serve you for years to come.

SUITABLE FOR ALL STOVES: Our cookware is designed to work seamlessly on all stove types, including induction, gas, electric, and ceramic. It's a versatile addition to any kitchen, providing rapid and evenly heat transfer for optimal cooking results.
SERVICE & GUARANTEE: In case you receive defect items caused by delivery, please don't hesitate to contact us, you will be guaranteed to get 100% refund or new replacement.
